product_opportunities.title: Smart Home Plant Watering System
product_opportunities.market_insights: With the rise in smart home gadgets, a plant watering system that integrates with home automation is gaining popularity. This product appeals to both tech enthusiasts and plant lovers, offering a unique niche with low competition.

product_opportunities.title: DIY Model Kit for Beginners
product_opportunities.market_insights: Model kits are seeing a resurgence as a popular hobby. Kits designed for beginners with easy-to-follow instructions are particularly in demand, providing a great entry point for new hobbyists.

product_opportunities.title: Portable Fitness Resistance Bands Set
product_opportunities.market_insights: With the trend towards home workouts continuing, portable fitness equipment like resistance bands remains popular. This product is lightweight, easy to ship, and appeals to a wide range of fitness enthusiasts.

product_opportunities.title: Gore-Tex Outdoor Jacket
product_opportunities.market_insights: Outdoor gear, especially high-quality jackets, is in demand as more people engage in outdoor activities. Gore-Tex jackets offer a high-value proposition with excellent profit margins.

product_opportunities.title: DIY Smart Home Security Kit
product_opportunities.market_insights: As home security becomes a priority, DIY smart security kits are gaining traction. These kits allow homeowners to customize their security setup, appealing to tech-savvy consumers looking for affordable security solutions.
